locale.name: en-US
locale.title: Baby Fruit Puzzle HD
locale.subtitle: Fruit jigsaw Park
locale.description: Use the Pad to join us in the wonderful fruit jigsaw tour and get to know all kinds of fruit together. There are delicious apples, bananas, peaches and so on. There are all kinds of fruits you want to eat. Do not miss them. The fruit includes berries: strawberry, blueberry, blackberry, mulberry, raspberry, grape, green, red, crystal, and horse milk citrus: sugar orange, citrus, orange, orange, citrus, grapefruit, grapefruit, grapefruit, lemon, and the new year's new year nuclear fruit: peach, plum, cherry, apricot, apricot, plum, and bayberry, West plum, plum, jujube, jujube, jujube, jujube, jujube, olive, litchi, longan, longan (Gui Yuan), areca benevolence, apple, pear, snake fruit, apple, fruit, fruit, persimmon, mangosteen, black brunle, loquat, carambola, hawthorn, Cherry Tomatoes, fig, Rohan, Pitaya, kiwi fruit Melon, melon, melon, cantaloupe, papaya, papaya, papaya and other: pineapple, mango, chestnut, coconut, kiwi fruit, guava, durian, banana, sugar cane, lotus seed, pomegranate, walnut
locale.promotional_text: Let the child know all kinds of fruit

keywords.keyword: 大家来找茬大冒险,莹石云视频,快乐小伴龙,安兔兔游戏助手,万能遥控器精灵美女报时,学习的,一起来,千丁管家,节奏大师免费,hdp直播,我们,夺宝,萤石运动,腾讯,集中注意力100,超级大本营,小胖

locale.name: zh-Hans
locale.title: 宝宝水果拼图HD
locale.subtitle: 水果拼图乐园
locale.description: 用平板来和我们一起开始奇妙的水果拼图之旅，一起认识各种各样的水果吧！ 这里有美味可口的苹果、香蕉、桃子等，你想吃的水果都有，应有尽有，千万不要错过呦！涵盖的水果有： 浆果类：草莓，蓝莓，黑莓，桑葚，覆盆子，葡萄，青提，红提，水晶葡萄， 马奶子 柑橘类：砂糖橘，金橘，甜橙，脐橙，西柚，柚子，葡萄柚， 柠檬，文旦 核果类：桃子，李子，樱桃，杏，梅子，杨梅， 西梅，乌梅，红枣，海枣，蜜枣，橄榄，荔枝，龙眼（桂圆），槟榔 仁果类：苹果 ，梨 ，蛇果，海棠果，沙果，柿子，山竹，黑布林， 枇杷，杨桃，山楂，圣女果，无花果，白果，罗汉果，火龙果，猕猴桃 瓜类：西瓜，甜瓜，香瓜，哈密瓜，木瓜，乳瓜 其他：菠萝，芒果，板栗，椰子，奇异果，芭乐，榴莲，香蕉，甘蔗， 莲子，石榴，核桃

keywords.keyword: 3岁宝宝游戏2,儿童识字启蒙,幼儿英语单词,上厕所,认知大全,动画片,2-3,拼图,专注学习免费6,直映认字,时空幻境,2kids学拼音拼读,爱刷牙,水果忍者,一,有机蔬菜种植,小孩玩的,益智,炒菜
